roleset.name: mode of motion
roleset.note: TREK-V NOTES: Member of Vncls run-51.3.2. (from trek.01-v)

example.name: GOL, not path
example.text: Sen. Alan Cranston trekked over to the House side of Capitol Hill a few days ago and volunteered his testimony to fellow Democrat Rep. Henry Gonzalez.
example.arg: over to the House side of Capitol Hill

example.name: ARG1
example.text: So I trekked the Annapurna circuit at the start of the year and absolutely loved it
example.arg: at the start of the year
